Description.Text: Grand Central Apartments is a self-catering accommodation 500 meters from the Rue Neuve, the main shopping street. IMPORTANT NOTE : Guests arriving after 20:00 are required to contact Grand Central Apartments ( by telephone 32-2-7937580 or by email reservations@grandcentralapartments.be ) 24 hours prior to their arrival to make arrangements for check-in. For same day reservations, please also contact the property prior to arrival to make arrangements for check-in. Please note that the entrance of the hotel is situated around the corner on Rue Des Pierres. This property is located in a car-free zone. A security deposit of EUR 100 is required upon arrival for incidentals. This deposit is fully refundable upon check-out and subject to a damage inspection of the accommodation. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply. Please inform Grand Central Apartments in advance of your expected arrival time, wherever possible

Located in the heart of Brussels, just steps away from the Stock Exchange Market, Grand Central Apartments is a self-catering accommodation offering stylish, refurbished apartments. The property is 200 meters from Brussels City Hall and 300 meters from the famous Grand Place, in the middle of the car-free zone. Many bars, restaurants and coffee shops are to be found in the near vicinity. The apartments are located above a supermarket.
This accommodation has a very small lobby.
